channel.title: Comments on: Migration II part 2
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Pukie
item.description:
I hope next New Year Festival I could spend with you...
Have a good trip!
Pukie
item.content:encoded:
I hope next New Year Festival I could spend with you…

Have a good trip!

Pukie

item.title: by: Michelle Allerdice
item.description: I was in Tampa visiting my best friend last week and I brought home some fireworks for Luke. I told the woman in the store I wanted something that could potentially blow off his arm and face at the same time. I was proud of myself for the mortars and broom handle sized roman candles I got him. That is, until I read this blog about your dynamite. Now I just feel inferior and embarrassed.
item.content:encoded: I was in Tampa visiting my best friend last week and I brought home some fireworks for Luke. I told the woman in the store I wanted something that could potentially blow off his arm and face at the same time. I was proud of myself for the mortars and broom handle sized roman candles I got him. That is, until I read this blog about your dynamite. Now I just feel inferior and embarrassed.

item.title: by: Kara
item.description: Hi Will.I just recently found your blog and i just wanted to say thank you for informing me about how crazy China will be.Im going April 2008.Im going on this huge guided tour to all the tourist destinations...i would rather go to the mountains and small villages but I suppose I should just be thankful for the chance to go at all. Wish me luck and good job on the blog and pictures.
item.content:encoded: Hi Will.I just recently found your blog and i just wanted to say thank you for informing me about how crazy China will be.Im going April 2008.Im going on this huge guided tour to all the tourist destinations…i would rather go to the mountains and small villages but I suppose I should just be thankful for the chance to go at all. Wish me luck and good job on the blog and pictures.

item.title: by: Amy Bugg
item.description: Will! I want to sit in a riverside bar in China and pay too much money for American beers too!!
item.content:encoded: Will! I want to sit in a riverside bar in China and pay too much money for American beers too!!
